name: Air Fryer One-Bite Roasted Potatoes
author: Yoly
summary: These air-fried roasted one-bite potatoes are crispy on the outside and creamy on the inside. Quick and easy to make.
ingredients: 2 teaspoons dry Italian-style salad dressing mix
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Preheat the air fryer to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Trim edges to make a flat surface on both ends
Combine extra-virgin olive oil and salad dressing mix in a large bowl
Add potatoes and toss until potatoes are well coated
Place in a single layer into the air fryer basket
Air fry until potatoes are golden brown, 5 to 7 minutes
Flip potatoes and air fry for an additional 2 to 3 minutes
